text:
One case where it would makes sense to use HubSpot CMS to build the intranet website would be,
if the intranet content majorly uses HubSpot as a data source e.g. to show customized views for CRM data to the intranet users.
With existing set of helper functions to access CRM data right in the HubL templates, it could give a development speed boost if your company already has developers building on CMS Hub.
